member.name: M:TemperatureConverterApp.Controllers.TemperatureController.ConvertTemperature(TC.DTOModels.TemperatureConvertRequest)
member.summary: This api endpoint converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin metrics.
member.remarks: The **temperatureTypeFrom** and **temperatureTypeTo** numerical values are mapped as follows * 1 - Celsius * 2 - Fahrenheit * 3 - Kelvin
